title: STEINS;GATE – Steam HD Edition
body:
STEINS;GATE – Steam HD Edition


Genres/Tags: Interactive fiction, Visual novel, 2D, Japanese
Companies: 5pb. Games, Nitroplus
Languages: ENG/JAP
Original Size: 5.7 GB
Repack Size: from 3.9 GB [Selective Download]

Download Mirrors

  • ExtraTorrent [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Filehoster: MegaUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable)
  • Filehoster: 5 hosters (Uploaded by Susch, interchangeable, NOT compatible with MegaUpload)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Steins.Gate-CODEX ISO release: codex-steins.gate.iso (6,168,805,376 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you can skip downloading and installing of movies in resolution you don’t need (720p & 1080p)
  • Slightly smaller archive size (compressed from 5.7 to 3.9~5.3 GB)
  • Installation takes 15-30 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 7 GB

Game Description

STEINS;GATE is the award-winning time travel science-fiction interactive visual novel developed by 5pb. and Nitroplus.

It is widely considered to be one of the finest Visual Novels ever made.

STEINS;GATE follows a rag-tag band of tech-savvy young students who discover the means of changing the past via mail, using a modified microwave. Their experiments into how far they can go with their discovery begin to spiral out of control as they become entangled in a conspiracy surrounding SERN, the organisation behind the Large Hadron Collider, and John Titor who claims to be from a dystopian future.

Interaction with the game takes place through the “phone trigger” system, where the player can receive calls and text messages and decide whether to reply to them or not, changing the outcome of the game’s plot.
